content: How would I compile rust with a custom cc-rs? [patch] doesn't work, as some crates will still pull in the cc-rs from crates.io (cough compiler-builtins cough), and I can't specify my own local compiler-builtins without recursive dependencies.
patch should work on both compiler-builtins and cc-rs

Jonas Schievink said:

patch should work on both compiler-builtins and cc-rs

if i patch compiler-builtins i get an epic recursive deps issue
